Dungeon Point System

Our community game is driven by volunteers. The most obvious kind are Dungeon Masters. As a reward we provide Dungeon Points. You can earn them in the following ways:

  • Earn Two (2) Write an adventure, including all maps and unique tokens
  • Earn Two (2) Run an adventure (3-4 hours)
  • Earn Two (2) Write a faction

Therefore, a DM that writes and runs a game gets 2 Dungeon Points.

Other ways to earn Dungeon Points:

  • Join one of our volunteer positions: Helper, Facilities, Marketeers, or as an Admin. Positions open up from time to time.
  • Art, ask the Admin team what art we need to enrich the game world.
  • Recruiting, if we are doing a recruiting, participate in helping to get new players
  • The #Dungeon-Points discord channel often has requests, scroll through.

Spending Dungeon Points

  • Four (4) points, exp boost to a game.
  • Four (4) points, cancel the exp penalty of a retrain
  • Two (2) points, 14 DTD and 7 Labour free for the week.
  • One (1) points, non combat pet such as a cat or dog.
